item.title: How to Register BRI SMS Banking
item.description:
How to Register BRI SMS Banking

by fastsong


How to Register for SMS Banking BRI -The easiest way is to go directly to the BRI Bank work unit so that it can be processed quickly.


The customer only needs to fill in the registration form by bringing their telephone number, photocopy of KTP, and photocopy of BRI savings book.


After this, it doesn't take long for the SMS banking service to be used.


As for registering at an ATM, it's also not difficult as long as you follow the steps correctly.


All you have to do is find an ATM machine to register the number you want to activate, here are the steps.


  1. Enter the ATM Card and Input PIN
  2. Select the Other Transactions menu
  3. Select the Registration menu
  4. Select the sms banking menu
  5. Create a 6 digit SMS Banking PIN
  6. Enter the phone number you want to use for SMS banking
  7. If successful, a receipt will appear indicating that the service registration was successful

Registration via ATM can only be used for non-cash (financial) transactions. To activate financial services through BRI work units.


Check BRI Balance Via SMS Banking


Checking balances by SMS is very easy to do, provided that the number has been registered according to personal data in the savings book.


If you have registered, SMS banking services can easily be done anywhere and anytime.


SMS banking is often the right way to get information about the balance in a passbook when there is no internet connection so you cannot maximize e-banking or mobile banking.


Or when you are in a position far from the ATM machine or have trouble finding it. The method is quite easy, namely with the following steps.


  1. Open the SMS menu on the cellphone.
  2. Then type in the format: SALDOPin ATM.
  3. Send to 3300
  4. Example: BALANCE 123456 send sms to 3300

If it has been sent, it won't take long for a reply SMS to show the amount of the balance in the BRI savings book.


This service is subject to the cost of sending and receiving SMS in accordance with the provisions of the mobile operator.


Advantages of SMS Banking

Many SMS banking has indeed left it along with the current developments.


Moreover, with the existence of the internet which has an increasingly vital role, this service is only used under certain conditions.


However, the sms banking service has advantages compared to other services.


Does not require Internet connection

Unlike e-banking and mobile banking which requires an internet connection to use it.


SMS banking only needs a provider's signal that is connected to the central service.


Of course, getting a provider's signal is easier than getting an internet signal, right?


Does not require special cellphone specifications

The next advantage is that it can be done using any type of cellphone. Even the simplest type is what matters is being able to send sms.


Unlike the latest services that require a smartphone with special technology, of course, the price is above average.


Faster and more practical

Finally, it is faster and more practical to get information about balances.


If you use an ATM machine or use other services, it takes time and steps.


Meanwhile, by using the SMS service, you just need to type and send, so you can easily check BRI's SMS banking balance.


The final word


That's how to check Bank BRI balances by using the SMS Banking service, I hope this information can be useful.

item.title: How to Pay Mandiri Credit Card Bills Via ATM & Online
item.description:
How to Pay Mandiri Credit Card Bills Via ATM & Online

by fastsong


How to Pay Mandiri Credit Card Bills - Paying Mandiri credit card bills is an obligation that you must do after using it.


Then how do you pay for a Bank Mandiri credit card to avoid unwanted things, here is a full review below.


How to Pay Mandiri Credit Card Bills

Many people sometimes forget and don't realize when to pay their credit card bills, as a result causing the number of bills to swell.


To avoid this, you should regularly check your credit card.

In checking, it can be done in several ways, for example via SMS banking or by ATM.


If via SMS you can simply type TGH (space) KK (space) 16 digit card number (space) 6 digit date of birth in dd/mm/yy format.


For example TGH KK 17230967852126730908994, then send the SMS format to number 3355.


After sending an SMS, you will get a reply about the amount of the bill or the amount of usage that has been used.



However, if you want to check through an ATM machine, you can insert your card and select the Mandiri credit card bill check menu, then the bill amount that must be paid will automatically appear.


Apart from going through an ATM machine, payments can be made in a number of ways that are quite practical and easy.


Among them by making payments with sms banking, or internet banking. Here's how to pay Mandiri credit card bills that you need to know.


Pay Bills Through Mandiri ATMs

The first option that you can choose to make credit card payments is to use an ATM. And here are the steps.


  1. Go to the nearest Mandiri ATM
  2. Insert ATM Card
  3. Select Indonesian
  4. Next, enter PIN
  5. Then select Other Transactions
  6. Select the Transfers menu
  7. Enter the Bank Mandiri code, namely 008
  8. Enter 16 digit Bank Mandiri Credit Card number
  9. Press OK/Correct
  10. Enter the Bill amount and select Correct to continue
  11. Then select Correct on the confirmation screen if the data is correct
  12. Transaction completed. Take a receipt for proof of payment

How to Pay Mandiri Credit Cards Through SMS Banking

Before making a bill payment using this method, first make sure that your mobile number is registered with the Mandiri SMS service.


For those who have not registered, see How to Register for SMS Banking Mandiri. After that, you can follow the steps below.


  1. Open the send message menu on the handphone
  2. type BYR (space) KK (space) account code (space) 16 digit card number (space) bill amount, for example BYR KK 3258769812567125 1000000.
  3. Then the format that has been made is sent to number 3355.
  4. Wait for an SMS confirmation containing a request for a PIN in certain sections, for example, you are asked for a PIN number in sequences 2 and 4. If your PIN number is 147235, then the second sequence is number 4 and the 4th sequence is number 2.
  5. Next, you have to send the number 42 for the confirmation request.
  6. If everything has been done, then your transaction has been successful.

How to Pay Bills Through Internet Banking

Almost the same as sms banking, to be able to use this one service you have to register first. Registration can be done through ATM machines and branch offices.


If you have previously registered with the service, you can follow the steps below.


  1. Login to the website page https://ibank.bankmandiri.co.id/ using your password and username
  2. After successfully logging in, you will find a navigation menu
  3. Click the navigation menu then click or select pay
  4. On the pay menu then select a credit card. Specify the payment destination bank, select Bank Mandiri
  5. Enter the 16 digit number printed on the credit card
  6. Enter the bill amount to be paid
  7. Then select the continue button
  8. Enter the PIN, and the transaction will be successful after you follow the last step

The final word

Payments via ATM Bersama are subject to an admin fee of IDR 5,000 – IDR 10,000 according to each bank's policy.


Payment through ATMs of different banks takes 2 to 3 days until payment is received.


To avoid arrears that cause fines, you should make payments earlier.


For further information, you can visit the nearest Mandiri branch or contact the Mandiri call center at 14000.

item.title: How to Use a BCA Credit Card for the First Time
item.description:
How to Use a BCA Credit Card for the First Time

by fastsong

Tips on how to use a BCA credit card for the first time are very important. This is because there are still many people who have not been able to use their BCA credit cards properly and efficiently, especially when using them as a payment method for goods purchased.

Later, we will discuss how to use BCA credit cards efficiently and correctly. For that, see this article to the end.

What is a BCA Credit Card?
The BCA credit card is a card originating from Bank BCA which has a function as a payment method, where payment will be deferred first by the bank and then the installment payment will be charged to the owner of the BCA account every month.


By having a BCA credit card, you usually get a discount on certain goods or products that you want to buy.

Or a BCA credit card can be used for those who want to get easy monthly installments when making payments.

But even though a credit card has many advantages for you, there are other things that must be considered in each use.

When you have a BCA credit card, you should be able to use it more wisely, so that you don't have a limit on usage and don't charge a lot.

Tips on How to Use a BCA Credit Card for the First Time
Knowing how to use a BCA credit card efficiently is something you must understand.


This is said to be important because in order to avoid excessive use and others. Here are ways to use a BCA credit card correctly.

Determine the Right Budget
Determining a budget when using a BCA credit card is an important thing to do. This is because you can synchronize between BCA credit cards for shopping.

For this, the bank will help determine the maximum limit that you can use on a BCA credit card. However, it is still recommended to choose a limit that really suits your needs.

Understand the Terms and Conditions for Using BCA Credit Cards
Using a credit card is not something you can take advantage of at will. We recommend that before using it as a payment method, you should know in advance about the terms and conditions for using a BCA credit card.

Not infrequently, many people blame the bank for using their credit card. Even if you look at it, it turns out that consumers who use credit cards don't really understand their use.

Not only that, you should also understand the amount of additional costs that must be incurred, for example regarding late payment fees or fines.

Use a Credit Card To Purchase Large Necessities
To be able to use a BCA credit card efficiently, you should use it to buy items that are quite large and only need installments.

This is considered more efficient than using a credit card to buy daily needs such as monthly shopping and others.

Pay Full Bills Every Month
In terms of paying BCA credit card bills, you should pay the maximum bill amount. This is so that there is no accumulation of bills in the following month.

With no accumulation of bills, later you can save for other needs. We recommend that you regularly check BCA credit card bills.

There's nothing wrong with using a credit card as a payment method, especially for those of you who want to buy goods in easy installments.

But what needs to be considered also about how to use it must be wiser and more efficient.

Tips on How to Use a BCA Credit Card for the First Time described above. Hopefully it can be used as a recommendation to apply to yourself.

The final word

This is the information we can convey. For further information, please visit the nearest BCA branch or contact the BCA call center at 1500888.

How to Buy Electricity Tokens Online via DigiPlay


How to buy electricity tokens online using Digiplay is quite easy to do.


PLN customers can also buy it using a cellphone or using a computer and laptop.



Overview of Digiplay

What is DigiPlay? DigiPlay is the most trusted top-up game, e-money, electricity token, voucher and credit site in Indonesia.



DigiPlay also provides top up games for Mobile Legends, Free Fire, PUBG Mobile, CODM, and many more.


Customers can top-up diamonds instantly and easily without the need to log in or register first.


Process when refilling and top-up within seconds after completing payment.


Tutorial on Buying Electricity Tokens Online via DigiPlay

DigiPlay Payment Method

If via bank transfer, customers can make payments by transferring to BCA, BRI and BNI bank accounts. If the payment is made using an e-Walet, there are also many choices, including GoPay, LinkAja, ShopeePay, OVO, Funds, etc.


In addition, buyers can also make payments through retail stores in various regions such as Alfamart, Indomaret, Alfamidi and other retail stores.


The final word

Well, it's quite easy, isn't it. How to buy electricity tokens online via DigiPlay.

item.title: How to Transfer Gopay to Funds Without the Hassle
item.description:
How to Transfer Gopay to Funds Without the Hassle

by fastsong

Maybe many of you are wondering if there is a way to transfer GoPay to funds. Even though it is a popular application, not everyone uses the GoPay digital wallet.


So sometimes it is necessary to make transfers to other digital wallet users such as DANA. DANA is a digital wallet that can be used for many different functions. Starting from saving balances, making shopping payments, and can even be used for transfers to accounts.


Almost the same as DANA, actually GoPay is also a very popular digital wallet. Even this digital wallet has been integrated with the Gojek application which is currently widely used.


The Easy Way to Transfer Gopay Balance to Funds


Basically, every digital wallet user makes it possible to transfer balances to other digital wallet users.


This is none other than the function of the digital wallet which can be used as a financial transaction tool.


For example, a user of a digital wallet A can transfer to a user of digital wallet B.


This condition makes it possible to send balances from GoPay to other digital wallet users, including DANA.


However, this method of transferring GoPay to funds is a bit longer than making transfers to fellow GoPay users.


Terms and Conditions


Before discussing further about the Gopay transfer process, you first need to know the requirements.


If these requirements are not met, the transfer process will not be carried out.


The main requirement for being able to transfer to another payment gateway account is that the GoPay account must be verified.


Or in other words, you need to make the account a Premium account called GoPay Plus.


How to verify the account is quite easy. You only need to upload a photo of yourself and KTP in the column provided.


If the verification process runs smoothly and is approved, then the Gojek account can become a premium and can be used for transfers.


Minimum and Maximum Gopay Transfers

Even though there is a way to transfer gopay to funds, the nominal cannot be arbitrary. Because there are maximum and minimum transfer limits that you must meet.


The minimum transfer limit using GoPay is IDR 10,000. Meanwhile, the maximum limit for GoPay transfers is IDR 20,000,000 per month.


So if you have transferred that nominal amount within one month, you will no longer be able to transfer. You have to wait for the next month so you can transfer again.



Procedure for Gopay Transfer to DANA

for those who want to know how to transfer gopay to funds, here are some easy steps

  1. Please first open the Gojek application.
  2. Then select the "Other" or "Explorer" section next to the top up menu.
  3. After opening it will display several different menu options that can be selected. Please select "Send".
  4. Select the transfer transaction to "another account".
  5. Enter your DANA account number, please click "Add to Your Account".
  6. Enter the nominal amount of the balance you want to transfer and enter the GoPay PIN.
  7. If so, you only need to wait for the transaction process to complete.


The final word

Thus a review of how to transfer gopay to the latest 2021 funds that you need to know.

Now you don't need to be confused anymore if you want to send balances from GoPay to DANA in an easy and practical way.

item.title: How to Check BCA Transfers at ATMs, M-Banking & KlikBCA
item.description:
How to Check BCA Transfers at ATMs, M-Banking & KlikBCA

by fastsong

There are many options for how to check BCA mutations that can be done by customers. For those who are not busy, they can do it through an ATM. Another option is to use Mobile Banking, SMS Banking, and Internet Banking.


Apart from the method above, you can also go to a BCA branch office, but this method is less effective, especially when you have to queue at the teller. The rest just adjust to your needs.


One fairly easy way is to use an ATM, if previously the internet, m-banking and SMS banking services were already active, this is a practical choice because you don't have to move from your seat.


Definition and Use of Account Movements


What exactly is account death? Account movements are all records or transaction history contained in a bank account, whether in the form of outgoing funds or incoming funds.



Account mutation has functions for:


  • To control all banking transactions that have been carried out both incoming and outgoing funds
  • Movement of accounts, very helpful for the smooth running of business for entrepreneurs
  • To report all transactions that occur in an account


An Easy Way to Check BCA Account Movements

It is possible that there are some customers who have difficulty checking mutations, especially for those who open a savings account for the first time.


The following are several ways that can be done to check mutations by banking customers.


How to Check BCA Account Movements via ATM

Transferring an account through an ATM can be done quite easily, that is, you just have to follow the steps below.


  1. Visit the nearest BCA ATM machine
  2. Insert ATM card
  3. Select the language and enter the ATM card PIN correctly
  4. Then select the Other Transactions menu
  5. Select Information
  6. Account Movement Options. Later a receipt will appear containing mutation information
  7. Done, end the transaction through the ATM if there is no need anymore

The receipt that just came out of the ATM machine contains mutation information, but only for the last 5 transactions.


If you want to find out more, as mentioned above, you can do it through the nearest branch or by using internet banking services.


How to Check BCA Movements Through Mobile Banking

  1. Please open the BCA Mobile Banking application
  2. Click the m-BCA menu
  3. Enter the BCA Mobile access code correctly
  4. Next, tap the m-Info menu
  5. Tap the Account Mutation menu
  6. Next select the type of transaction
  7. Adjust the desired mutation period
  8. Tap send and enter the BCA Mobile Banking PIN correctly

How to Check BCA Movements via KlikBCA / Internet Banking

  1. Please open your favorite browser on your laptop or computer
  2. Open the BCA internet banking site at https://ibank.klikbca.com/
  3. Enter the correct BCA internet banking User ID and PIN
  4. Then click Login to enter the BCA internet banking service
  5. Please select Account Information
  6. Next, click Account Mutation



Final Word

By following the steps mentioned above, you can easily check BCA Bank account mutations. Such is the information that tipskita.com can summarize.


For further information, please visit the nearest Bank BCA work unit or contact the call center at 1500888.

item.title: Nearest Bank Mandiri From My Current Location
item.description:
Nearest Bank Mandiri From My Current Location

by fastsong

The Nearest Bank Mandiri is a topic that is often searched for by someone via the internet. In addition, Bank Mandiri, which has its head office in Jakarta, is one of the largest banks.


Leading, Trusted and Growing with You is the slogan of Bank Mandiri from 2008 until now. Bank Mandiri's slogan has changed 4 times.


In addition to being a widespread bank in Indonesia, both in terms of assets, loans and deposits, Bank Mandiri also continues to strive to become the most trusted bank by offering banking products, opening branch offices, cash offices, adding ATM locations.


Bank Mandiri is also trying to provide services for the convenience of its customers, such as providing internet banking, mobile banking and SMS banking services.


Not only that, weekend banking services are also presented to answer customers who don't have time to go to the bank from Monday to Friday.


How to Find the Current Nearest Bank Mandiri Location

Currently there are 1,296 branch offices (Wikipedia). With the large number of customers spread across various regions of Indonesia and abroad, the question arises, where is the nearest Bank Mandiri address? Nearest Mandiri ATM? How to find a location on the Bank Mandiri site

On the official website of Bank Mandiri there is a page to display the location of Bank Mandiri, be it branch offices, ATM addresses, and Cash Offices based on location or can display the entire address.


This page is presented, of course, to help customers accurately and precisely. Because the page will of course continue to be updated if there is a change in data.

All you have to do is select a location or enter an address then click Search. Then the data will be attached underneath.


Looking for location information by visiting the official website, you will get more precise information and the method is fairly easy.


Or you can also directly call Mandiri Call at 14000, you will be helped wholeheartedly.


In addition, if you search for the nearest Bank Mandiri topic using the Google search engine.

How to Find Bank Mandiri Office Addresses and ATMs on Google Maps

item.title: How to Top Up Funds via Bank Jatim at ATMs and Mobile Banking
item.description:
How to Top Up Funds via Bank Jatim at ATMs and Mobile Banking

by fastsong

How to Top Up Funds via Bank Jatim - After successfully registering or registering in the Fund application using a phone number that is still active, namely filling in the Fund balance.


Later the money transferred to the Fund application can be used for various needs such as payments, purchases or transfers to other banks or fellow Fund application users.


Now, to top up your own Fund balance, you can do it in various ways and media. This facility is of course provided by the Fund application to make it easier to use, one of which is to top up the balance via bank transfer.


How to Top Up Funds via Bank Jatim

Transferring money to the Dana application through a bank can be done using the ATM network, internet banking and mobile banking.


However, not all banks support the contents of the Fund balance directly. If the transfer to the Fund application is made other than to a bank that has cooperated with the Fund, it can be done by transferring to a CIMB Niaga Virtual Account.


The steps for filling in your Fund balance via bank transfer can be seen below.


Create Virtual Accounts

  1. Open the Funds and Login application
  2. Tap the Top Up menu
  3. Select the bank transfer payment method
  4. Select the bank that will be used to top up the Fund balance
  5. Note down the Virtual Account number

Top up the balance through the ATM

  1. Go to the nearest ATM machine
  2. Insert the ATM card into the ATM machine
  3. Enter the ATM PIN correctly
  4. Select the Other transaction menu, then Transfer then select To Account Virtual Account
  5. Enter the Virtual Account number that was created in the Fund application
  6. Enter the amount of money to be transferred to the Funds application
  7. Then follow the instructions on the ATM screen
  8. The ATM machine will print a proof of transaction receipt, save the receipt

Fill Balance Through Mobile Banking

  1. Open the mobile banking application
  2. Login to mobile banking
  3. Tap the transfer menu
  4. Select Go to Virtual Account
  5. Enter the Virtual Account number that was created in the Fund application
  6. Enter the amount of money to be transferred to the Funds application
  7. Then follow the directions from the mobile banking application

Supporting Banks To Fill Fund Balances

  • Bank BCA via ATM BCA, KlikBCA, m-BCA
  • Bank BRI through BRI ATMs, internet banking, mobile banking and BRI mini ATMs
  • Bank BNI through BNI ATMs, internet banking and mobile banking
  • Bank Mandiri through ATM Mandiri, Livin by Mandiri and ATM Bersama
  • Bank CIMB Niaga through CIMB Niaga ATMs, CIMB Clicks, Go Mobile and ATM Bersama
  • Panin Bank through Panin ATMs, internet banking and mobile banking
  • BTPN Bank via BTPN ATM, Jenius and USSD Wow!
  • Maybank via maybank2u, Maybank sms and mobile banking
  • Bank Danamon via Dmobile and internet banking
  • Bank Sinarmas through ATM Sinarmas, mobile banking and internet banking
  • Bank BTN through BTN ATMs, internet banking and mobile banking
  • DBS Bank through the Digibank by DBS application
  • For other banks by transferring to CIMB Virtual Account

So, from the list of banks above, it can be concluded that direct transfers when filling in Fund balances from Bank Jatim have not provided any facilities.


The alternative is by transferring to a CIMB Virtual Account. To create a Virtual Account number in the Funds application has been discussed above, for the purpose of topping up the balance, select CIMB Niaga bank.


The final word

Such is the information that we can conclude and summarize from various sources. Hopefully this information can answer those who are looking for topics related to How to Top Up Funds via Bank Jatim.

item.title: Get to know the Types of Investment and How to Invest for Beginners
item.description:
Get to know the Types of Investment and How to Invest for Beginners

by fastsong

Get to know the Types of Investment and How to Invest for Beginners

Before we discuss more about the types of investments and how to invest, please note that investing is an activity of placing funds in one or more types of assets for a certain period, with the aim of earning income or increasing value. In simple terms, investment is one of the tools to realize our financial goals.


Basically, everyone's financial goals are different. For example, a 25 year old person certainly has different plans and goals than a 50 year old person.


Based on the purpose, investments are divided into long-term, medium-term and short-term investments. Different timeframes, of course, different investment strategies and instruments.

Types of Investment Based on Purpose

1. Short Term Investment

Short-term investments last between less than one year to three years.


For example, a 25-year-old youth intends to get married in three years. So he needs fresh funds to organize a wedding that is not cheap.


Given this need, the youth are advised to invest in low-risk instruments in the sense that they have stable fluctuations in value, high liquidity so that they are easily converted into cash, and can generate a steady income. Some of the suggested instruments for him are deposits, money market mutual funds, or short-term government bonds.


Can this young man invest in stocks for this financial purpose? You can, but of course it's not recommended. The reason is that stocks are instruments that have high fluctuations in value in the short term. Buying stock is the same as buying a business, and business growth certainly cannot be assessed only in the short term.


2. Medium Term Investment

When someone has financial goals between 3 to 10 years, then this can be called a medium-term investment.


For example, in the next five years Mr. Budi must enroll his son at a well-known university in Jakarta. So Mr. Budi needs a sizable fund to pay the entrance fee and the first semester.


Given that his funding needs are more than five years, Mr. Budi can choose instruments with a slightly higher risk than deposits, money market mutual funds, or government bonds, in the hope of obtaining higher yields.


The instruments in question are fixed income mutual funds (bonds), private bonds, mixed mutual funds.


3. Long Term Investment

When the investment goal is over 10 years, this investment is included in the long-term investment category.


These investment objectives can be in the form of children's education costs, costs of organizing children's weddings, buying assets for posterity, and retirement funds.


The longer the investment period, the more flexible a person chooses the instrument. They can choose instruments with low, moderate, high risk, or instruments that cannot be converted quickly.


Some of the instruments that can be chosen for long-term investment include precious metals, stock mutual funds, stocks, and property.



How To Invest

Investing is not difficult, considering that in today's digital era, information about investment instruments or market research is very easy to obtain. However, investment certainly cannot be done haphazardly.


Here is a good way to invest, in order to realize our financial goals.


1. Make Sure We Are Financially Healthy

Before investing, make sure you have an ideal emergency fund and have financial protection by having health insurance or insurance.


Planning finances for the future is very important. But never underestimate the things that are of concern and priority in the present.


Without an ideal emergency fund, we will have difficulty dealing with the risk of loss of income due to layoffs or economic uncertainty. Without health protection, we can also lose quite a lot of money when we have to seek treatment.


2. Set Goals First

Know the financial goals to be achieved in various periods. Call it for the short term, medium term, and long term. Without clear goals, the investment process will be immeasurable.


After setting goals, also determine the funding needs to realize them. We can start the investment process after understanding the need for funds.


3. Get to know the Risk Profile

Each investment instrument has different investment characteristics, and each investor also has a different risk profile. The risk profile depends on a person's ability and willingness to tolerate investment risk.


Conservative investors tend to avoid instruments with volatilityhigh, and aggressive investors are more willing to take risks because they want high returns.


The risk profile can, of course, change when one's understanding of investing begins to increase. Increased understanding of investing will increase the ability to tolerate risk.


4. Recognize Systematic and Non-Systematic Investment Risks

If the risk profile has a benchmark in the form of the investor's psychological condition, there is also investment risk that investors cannot escape.


In investing, there are two types of risk, namely systematic and non-systematic. Systematic is a completely unavoidable and diversifying risk, and attacks all kinds of instruments. These risks can be in the form of market risk, changes in interest rates, and inflation. Meanwhile non-systemic risk is stated as risk that can still be avoided by diversifying investment instruments. These risks include business risk, liquidity risk and lawsuit risk.


These are the things you should know before investing. Make sure you know the types, risks, and how to invest properly so that our financial goals can be achieved.

item.title: Factors considered in choosing chairs for office purposes
item.description:
Factors considered in choosing chairs for office purposes

by fastsong

Chairs for office purposes are one of the important elements to support daily work. Just imagine if you sit all day in an uncomfortable chair. This can also interfere with health in the long run can also interfere with your productivity at work. So choosing a chair for comfortable and ideal office purposes has become a necessity. There are various health risks if you are wrong in choosing chairs for office purposes. The most common cases are back pain, neck, or legs.


For recommendations, you can visit Highpoint Furniture that provides a wide selection of chairs for office purposes such as the Austin model with a typical high rear backward equipped with a height that can be arranged, ARM Rest, and the bottom of a chair with comfortable nylon material. In choosing chairs for office purposes, here are some factors to consider, as follows:


Height

This factor is important because the right height will help support your body correctly as well. There are chairs for office purposes with a high permanent but some can be arranged as needed. We recommend that you choose the second type so that it can be adjusted to your body high.


Wheel

It would be more practical and efficient if you choose a chair for wheeled office purposes so that you can be free to move without having to move from the chair. For example if you have to move from one table to another then with a wheeled chair then it is very easy to do without you having to lift a chair.


Chair back

Choosing a chair for office purposes that has a backrest is very necessary to support your back properly while sitting. The backrest must be able to support your back to stay in a 90 degree upright position. The ideal backrest must also be soft and not make your back hurt after you sit for hours.


Armrests

This is also an important factor because your hands do not always work on typing on a computer. There is a time you are tired and need to rest your hands. It is when the back of the hand is needed. Choose a chair for office purposes with a handrest that can be adjusted so that it can be adjusted to your needs.

item.title: Start a Healthy Lifestyle With 4 Easy Steps
item.description:
Start a Healthy Lifestyle With 4 Easy Steps


by fastsong

4 easy steps to a healthy lifestyle - Great Eastern Takaful

Everyone dreams of having a healthy lifestyle, but making changes is not an easy thing. Removing bad habits and replacing them with good ones is a very challenging task. Many are desperate in the middle of the road.


To start a healthy lifestyle, you need to look at various aspects such as food preservation, mental health and physical exercise. Many people already know the principle, but why are there still many who fail?


One of the causes is making changes at rates too abruptly. Before this, I have never exercised, if I think about changing, I will run 5KM. As a result, the body hurts for 2-3 days, then I feel lazy to do it already.


This sudden change may last 1-2 weeks, but after that we will be tired and hopeless. Make lifestyle changes little by little according to your comfort level, the most important thing is that this healthy lifestyle lasts until the end of our lives.


Let's start a lifestyle with these 4 steps.

 

1. Food Control


One of the mistakes when you want to change your eating style is to follow extreme diet tips to lose weight quickly, but when you've finished the diet, the weight goes back up above the level before the diet.


The style of healthy eating is being aware of what goes into your mouth, not eating according to what your appetite wants. Does this mean we can no longer eat donuts, cakes or fast food? No, the key is control, these useless foods we eat for a certain time only such as birthday celebrations or as a reward after achieving something. And eat in abundance.


One easy way to control food consumption is to use the Malaysian Health Plate #sukkuseparuh concept suggested by the Malaysian Ministry of Health. You can still eat rice, but in controlled quantities. The 2 things you need to remember in healthy eating are awareness and control.

4 steps to a healthy lifestyle - control diet

2. Increase Physical Activity


Most of today's jobs do not require a lot of physical movement, 7-8 hours a day just sitting in front of the computer. Before starting regular exercise activities, try to be more active with the 5 suggestions below.

Walk for short trips (under 1km)

Use the stairs instead of the lift

The car park is far from the office

Stretch for 10 minutes for every 1 hour

Be diligent in doing housework (sweeping, mopping)


For exercise activities, find the activity that best suits you, you can dance, do yoga, run, jump rope or play ball. Do it at least 3 times a week, 30 minutes each session. Exercise not only helps reduce weight and prevent disease, it can also increase energy and make you happier by producing the hormones dopamine, adrenaline and endorphins. "A smart mind lies in an agile body" - Arabic proverb.

 


4 steps to a healthy lifestyle - Get more physical activity



3. Take Care of Mental Health


It's no use if our bodies are healthy but our minds are depressed. With the pressure at work and the stress of traveling through traffic jams, it's easier for today's generation to get mentally under pressure. We will feel that life is just work, eating and sleeping, while it is more than that.


Here are some activities to maintain mental health:

Studies have proven that meditation can control stress and anxiety. For Muslims, praying and praying is also a form of meditation. When our prayers are like being separated from the world for a while, forgetting all problems at once, this is our time with God. Then express everything in your prayers.


Learn a new skill or start a new hobby to keep your mind young and active. You may start writing, painting, gardening or studying music. Spend about 10-15 minutes a day is sufficient.


Spend time with nature. Once in a while we need to run away from the bustle of the capital. Go hiking at a waterfall or beach, take a walk in a public park or hike in a hill. Seeing the greenery of nature also proves good for your eyes.

 

Mental health - Great Eastern Takaful



4. Get Enough Sleep

Adequate sleep is a very important element in fostering a healthy lifestyle. Not getting enough sleep will make it difficult for your brain to focus and easily get sick. Set your bedtime, don't sleep at 12 tonight, tomorrow at 1 am and the day after tomorrow at 2 am. Sleep at least 6-8 hours a day. No matter how busy you are, make sure you get enough sleep.


Start a healthy lifestyle by changing little by little in every aspect of life. Start with small steps and improve over time. Remember, it is a journey not a destination.


Finally, to top it all off, you need to maintain a healthy lifestyle

item.title: Know the difference between antiperspiran and deodorant
item.description:
Know the difference between antiperspiran and deodorant

 by fastsong

 

Antiperspiran and deodorant are two cosmetic products that are widely used for men and women. Both have their own way to reduce body odor. However, many consider these two products the same, even though they have different functions.


Having an unpleasant body odor can actually be very annoying. Therefore, the demand for these two products is quite high. However, you need to adjust your conditions and goals before choosing between antiperspiran and deodorant. No need to worry, all of them are considered safe for daily use and do not pose a risk of harmful side effects.


Differences in antiperspiran and deodorant

Deodorant is formulated to eliminate underarm odor but not sweat. This product is usually based on alcohol. Meanwhile, antiperspiran is tasked with blocking the body's ecrin glands, which produce sweat. This usually comes from aluminum -based materials.


For more details, consider the following discussion:


1. Deodorant to eliminate body odor

Deodorant is the most appropriate choice, if the goal is to eliminate the armpit odor. Because, deodorant can kill bacteria that cause underarm odor, so that it can protect the armpits from unpleasant odors. Body odor can be easily overcome by using fragrant and soft deodorant.


While antiperspiran cannot eliminate and kill bacteria that cause body odor. Antiperspiran contains substances that can slow the performance of the sweat glands, so that the production of sweat is much reduced.


Antiperspiran serves to prevent excessive sweating. The smell of armpits that smell actually appear when sweat meets bacteria on the surface of the skin.


2. Antiperspiran to inhibit armpit sweat

Antiperspiran is included in drugs that function to reduce sweat production. The way it works by affecting the sweat glands and perspiration, so that the armpits are free from odor due to the accumulation of bacteria. Antiperspiran contains active ingredients aluminum chlorohydrate which can hold sweat for 1-2 days.


However, antiperspiran cannot cover the pungent body odor, unlike deodorant. If you want to keep the armpit area free of smell, you must keep using deodorant. You can use products that contain both to get two benefits at once.


Combination products of deodorant and antiperspiran are appropriate for you who sweat and smell. However, for some people who sweat very much, the use of a combination of deodorant and antiperspiran is not recommended because it is not optimal to reduce sweat production.


Which one is better?

To choose which best product is to adjust to the needs of each body. If the problem encountered is an unpleasant armpit, you can choose deodorant to overcome it. Meanwhile, to reduce excessive sweating, you can choose antiperspiran. Antiperspiran is also advised for you who often move outdoors.


That's the discussion about the differences in antiperspiran and deodorant. If you need to consult a doctor regarding health problems, you can visit the hospital selected through the Halodoc application. What are you waiting for, let's download Halodoc right now!

item.title: MINIMALIST LIFESTYLE, WRONG
item.description:
MINIMALIST LIFESTYLE, WRONG?

by fastsong

Most of today's young people have an exaggerated lifestyle, but there are also young people who are starting to think and turn to a minimalist lifestyle. A good thing isn't it? The good thing about this minimalist lifestyle change is that it teaches us to be practical human beings.


So then, what is a minimalist lifestyle? According to Break the Twitch, minimalism is a lifestyle that focuses on minimizing distractions that can keep us from doing only the things that really matter. Meanwhile, according to Joshua Becker, author of Becoming Minimalist, minimalism is about getting what makes us happy and eliminating what doesn't. From this understanding we can know that minimalist life is "a simple or practical lifestyle or simply throwing away something you don't really need". For example, screenshots on our cellphones that are taken thinking they will be needed but in fact never opened will eventually fill up the cellphone memory. Another example is buying a backpack with a different model with the excuse that it will be used later but in fact it is not used at all instead it piles up in the bag storage.


Minimalism can be used for everything, not just limited to products, but includes fashion, social media, use of gadgets and the internet. Eating now minimalist has also penetrated digital. Minimalism does not only cover items that are not needed and then thrown away, but also includes "when we buy new, similar items, a number of the same items and the same type must be removed". Yes, "don't accumulate goods and don't use goods excessively".


From what has been explained, we can see that it is not wrong to have a minimalist lifestyle. In fact, in this way we are able to create space and time that is more useful than just wasting it. The question arises whether choosing a minimalist lifestyle is limited and creates boundaries? Of course not, so living a minimalist life is not limiting but organizing and giving more space for useful things.


OK, so what? Still unsure about starting a minimalist lifestyle?

item.title: This is how to choose a bra push-up according to breast shape
item.description:
This is how to choose a bra push-up according to breast shape

by fastsong

Push-up Bra is one type of clothing used to make the breasts look fuller and tighter. Push-up Bra can also make a more attractive appearance.


The encouragement of the push-up bra will lift the breasts, thus giving a loud appearance, especially when wearing clothes with low cleavage. However, behind the benefits of the display it gives, the use of underwear must not be careless. You need to choose the type that suits the shape of the breast. More information can be read here!


How to choose a push-up bra

Push-up bras that are not in accordance with the shape of the breast will press the chest and make the chest hurt. If it is too big, then this will not succeed in supporting the chest and lifting it.


So, how to choose a bra push-up that matches the shape of the breast? This is the choice:


1. Big Chest

If you have large breasts, choose a type that has progressive pads and is made from soft. This bra will add volume to the sides and lower breasts.


Bra with progressive pads will also increase removal without adding volume only in the front of the cleavage. Progressive bearings will make chest volume evenly distributed. For the owner of a large chest, it's good to avoid a bra with a thin rope and choose a high -ranking one.


2. Small or medium -sized chest

For the owner of a small or medium chest, you can choose a soft bra to increase breasts. Choose a half -shaped soft bra so that the chest removal is more leverage. The effect of the push-up bra with half shape will give a larger and more round cleavage appearance.


3. Chest shape is not symmetrical

For the owner of breasts that are not symmetrical, you need some adjustments. Choose the type with a soft layer that can be removed. This will help you adjust the visual appearance and shape of the breast.


A sign that the bra is not appropriate

Actually there is no specific way to choose to determine whether certain push-up bras are not suitable for breast shape A or B. You can adjust by feeling when wearing the bra.


Surely you have to prioritize comfort rather than appearance or model. If the bra you wear is too pushing the breast or leaving a line on the skin, that means you wear a size that is too tight.


Benefits of Using Push-Up Bra

In addition to displaying the shape of the breast that contains, the following are the benefits of using other Bra push-ups:


1. Dimensions of appearance

Push-up Bra can provide a perfect body dimension, because the bra pushes the chest that has an impact on the overall appearance of the body. It can give dimensions to the waist and chest area so as to make the appearance more elegant maximum.


2. Increase the cleavage

item.title: These are signs and symptoms of temporomandibular joint syndrome (TMJ)
item.description:
These are signs and symptoms of temporomandibular joint syndrome (TMJ)

by fastsong

This disease occurs when there is a disorder in the two jaws near the ear. You should know more about the symptoms of temporomandibular joint syndrome so that you can do prevention and care to relieve the symptoms that you experience.


Alert symptoms of temporomandibular joint syndrome

Temporomandibular joint is a joint that connects the lower jaw (mandibular) to the skull. The joints are on both sides of the head and are in front of the ear. This joint is quite important because it helps the jaw to open and close when you talk, eat, to chew.


Until now the exact cause of the temporomandibular joint syndrome is not known with certainty. However, there are several risk factors that cause this condition to occur, such as jaw injuries, the habit of gritting teeth, suffering from arthritis, to connective tissue diseases that affect the joints.


This condition is very vulnerable to the age group 20-40 years. In addition, women experience this disease more often than men. To take care, you should know the various symptoms that are the health complaints of this disease, such as:


  • Pain in the ear area to the neck.
  • Jaw muscles that become stiff.
  • Limited jaw movement.
  • Difficulty chewing.
  • Pain in the jaw area when opening the mouth.
  • Locked jaw.
  • Damage to the teeth.
  • Vertigo.
  • Headache.
  • Jaw shift.
  • Tinnitus.
  • Swelling in the temporomandibular joint area.

Temporomandibular joint syndrome examination

This disease can be seen when you do a regular dental health check. Usually the doctor will observe the movement of opening and closing his mouth and emphasizing the face to ensure the uncomfortable part.


If the doctor suspects you experience it, there are some further examinations you need to do, such as:


Panoramic Xray. This examination will provide an overview of the condition of the tooth to the jaw.

CBCT scan. This examination will capture thousands of images about the condition of teeth and jaw. Later the image catch will be combined into a detailed picture.

MRI Scan. This examination is carried out to ensure the condition of soft tissue in the jaw joint. This examination also makes a doctor or medical team know the joint function can function properly or not.

Treatment and treatment

In somewhat mild disorders, this disease does not require special treatment. However, if the symptoms cause disorders of activity, immediately overcome with various treatments, such as:


1. Medicines

The use of drugs can relieve symptoms associated with this disease. There are several types of drugs to relieve symptoms, such as pain relievers and anti -inflammatory, antidepressants, to rigid muscle relievers.


2. Therapy

Therapy can also be used as a treatment. Usually, therapy serves to increase the strength of the jaw muscles to help you avoid various activities that can trigger the condition getting worse.


3. Surgery

If drugs and therapy cannot overcome the problems you experience, the medical team can suggest surgery to overcome this problem.


4. Home Care

In addition to medical treatment, you also need to do home treatment so that this condition will improve immediately. There are some treatments that you can do, such as:


Reducing jaw movements.

Eating soft foods.

Avoid chewing hard foods.

Perform warm -up movements for the jaw.

Compress using warm or cold water to relieve pain.

Those are some things you need to know about the temporomandibular joint syndrome.

item.title: This is a worm medicine for adults that the doctor is usually prescribed
item.description:
This is a worm medicine for adults that the doctor is usually prescribed

by fastsong

Worms become one of the diseases caused by parasitic infections in the body. Not only in children, in fact this disease is also vulnerable to adults. If you do not get the right treatment, intestinal worms can cause health problems that are getting worse.


In addition to maintaining cleanliness of the body, you can also overcome worms using worms for adults. There are various types of drugs that you can consume as a treatment for intestinal worms. However, make sure you take worm medicine in accordance with the advice and dose of the doctor to avoid unwanted side effects.


Type of worm medicine for adults

People with worms can experience some health complaints, such as stomach pain and diarrhea. In addition, sometimes there is blood in the stool when suffering from worms.


These symptoms will usually be accompanied by other health complaints, such as fatigue, flatulence, to weight loss. Do not ignore complaints of rashes or itching in the rectum area. We recommend that you immediately do an examination because these symptoms are related to intestinal worms.


If the examination shows you have intestinal worms, of course the doctor will do treatment to overcome this disease. There are various types of drugs that are often used to treat intestinal worms, such as:


1. Mebendazole

Mebendazole is one type of adult worm medicine to overcome this disease. This drug is tablet or liquid. Mebendazole can kill worms, but do not overcome worm eggs.


Make sure you take this medicine according to the doctor's advice. This is because Mebendazole can cause side effects, such as diarrhea and abdominal pain. This drug is also not recommended for pregnant women, breastfeeding, children under the age of two years, and someone with a history of drug allergy.


2. Levamisole

This is an anti -parasitic drug that works by suppressing enzymes in the worm muscles. That way, worms are unable to multiply and die slowly.


You need to take this drug according to the doctor's recommendations and doses. Excessively consuming this drug causes various side effects that can occur, such as diarrhea, nausea, dizziness, to sleep disorders.


3. Albendazole

This drug works by preventing worms absorbing sugar in the body so that the worms lose energy and die. This worm medicine also requires a doctor's prescription so that you consume it according to the right dose.


Albendazole is not for children, the elderly, nursing mothers, to someone with a history of drug allergies. This medicine is available in the form of chewing tablets and drinking tablets. Although it is rare, you should immediately check the health condition if you experience side effects, such as fever, black stool, to pain or difficulty urinating.


4. Ivermectin

Ivermectin is one of the worm medicine for adults. This drug requires a doctor's prescription for its use. Ivermectin needs to be consumed when the stomach is empty, usually 1-2 hours before eating.


Immediately check the health condition if during taking this drug appears allergic symptoms, such as rashes, difficulty breathing, to swelling on the face.

item.description:
Help quickly recover, this is a type of food for vomiting

Muntaber is a disease that attacks digestion. The cause can be viruses, bacteria or parasites. As a result of the infection, the stomach experiences inflammation, causing symptoms in the form of diarrhea, nausea, vomiting and stomach cramps.


So that the symptoms do not get worse, you certainly should not eat carelessly. Well, there are some foods that are recommended for you to eat during vomiting. Porridge, for example. This food is safe because the taste is not too strong and the texture is soft so the stomach is easy to digest it.


Foods that are safe for consumption during vomiting

Here are the types of food that you are safe for consuming during vomiting:


1. Food bland

When vomiting, you should choose food that tastes not too strong or tend to be bland. Because, food that tastes quite complex can further irritate the intestine. Examples of lightweight bland foods digested by the intestine, namely:


Hot cereals, such as oatmeal, wheat cream, or rice porridge.

  • Banana.

  • Bread or toast.
  • Boiled potato.
  • Crackers without seasoning.
  • Food in a little portion but often so that digestion does not work too heavy.


2. Probiotics

In addition to bland food, probiotics also include foods that you can consume. In fact, this food helps the healing process, you know! The reason, probiotics help add good bacteria in the intestine to fight bad bacteria. Some probiotic foods, for example miso, yogurt and kefir.


3. Expand liquid

Fluid is also important for recovery of muntaber. The sufferer needs to drink an additional cup of water after every bowel movement or vomiting. The goal is to prevent dehydration and remove toxins out of the body.


In addition to water, the body also loses minerals and electrolytes due to vomiting and diarrhea. That's why you should choose liquid containing minerals and electrolytes to replace the lost fluid. You can get it from soup broth, coconut water and ORS.


Food abstinence during vomiting

Foods or drinks that contain artificial sweeteners.

item.title: Mother, this is a common cause of vomiting in children
item.description:
Mother, this is a common cause of vomiting in children

by fastsong

Mother, you should make sure the child always consumes clean food and drinks. There are various diseases that can be transmitted from food intake exposed to viruses, bacteria, or germs, one of which is vomiting. If not treated properly, vomiting in children can cause children to dehydrate.


Muntaber is a disease that can be contagious. For this reason, you should know various causes that can cause children to vomit. Also find out various prevention so that children's health is always in optimal conditions.


Causes of vomiting in children

Muntaber is also known as gastroenteritis. This condition occurs when the walls of the digestive tract are inflamed due to infections caused by viruses or bacteria.


It should be aware that vomiting is very easily transmitted especially in groups of children. However, Norovirus, Rotavirus, and Adenovirus are the causes of vomiting most often experienced by children.


This happens because exposure to viral infections is so fast especially children still do not have optimal body immunity. Therefore, the spread and transmission will be very easy to occur.


In addition to the three viruses, vomiting can also be caused by bacterial infections. Usually, spread through bacteria occurs through food or drinks exposed.


For this reason, if the child experiences health complaints related to vomiting, you should avoid children with a crowd to prevent spread. Vomiting can be transmitted to others in several ways, such as:


  • Touching the mouth, eyes, and nose after holding the item being exposed to a virus or bacteria.
  • Sharing food and drinks with sufferers of vomiting.
  • Live together with people with vomiting.

Recognize the symptoms of vomiting in children

Common symptoms that will be experienced by children after vomiting are nausea and diarrhea that is quite severe. Some children experience fever conditions as an initial symptom of vomiting.


The danger, when a child releases a lot of fluids during diarrhea and vomiting, the body can dehydrated. Unrequited vomiting can cause symptoms of dehydration in children. Of course, when dehydration in children is not treated properly, this condition can cause worse health problems.


For that, immediately do an examination at the hospital when the child experiences some symptoms of dehydration, such as:


  • Dry mouth.
  • Reduced frequency of urination.
  • A body that feels cold.
  • Weak.
  • Dark urine.


Muntaber treatment at home

Until now there is no treatment or treatment that can overcome this disease directly. Provision of drugs for children must certainly be done in accordance with the doctor's advice and advice.


Some types of drugs given by doctors are only used to reduce symptoms in children so that children feel more comfortable. In addition, mothers can also do various treatments at home so that children's health is getting better, such as:


  • Avoid giving children foods that have a strong enough taste. Give children soft food with light taste. Mother can give children porridge or vegetable soup.
  • Give adequate fluids to avoid dehydration. Make sure the child consumes enough water. After that, you can give other drinks, such as juice.
  • Prepare healthy snacks for children, for example jelly, bananas, or bread.

Always remind children to maintain hand cleanliness after doing various activities. Teach children about how to wash the right hands to avoid various diseases that can be caused by dirty hands.

item.title: 6 treatment options for dealing with intestinal infections in children
item.description:
6 treatment options for dealing with intestinal infections in children

by fastsong

Conditions of intestinal infections or gastroenteritis occur due to inflammation of the intestine. This is common in children, even children can experience more than once a year. The severity is quite diverse. There are symptoms of mild abdominal pain for 1-2 days, diarrhea, or vomiting for several days or more.


Many viruses, bacteria and other microbes that can cause gastroenteritis. Bad microorganisms that can be found in water, soil, even in food consumed daily can cause intestinal infections in children. Because it is classified as serious, the mother must know how to handle to handle it.


How to deal with intestinal infections in children

Symptoms of intestinal infections in children will usually only settle a few days or more because the immune system can cleanse the infection by itself. Therefore, children can usually be treated independently at home. However, treatment in hospitals is needed if the symptoms are getting worse or if complications occur.


Usually the treatment that can be done for gastroenteritis is rest and drink enough fluid. After a child has gastroenteritis, parents must monitor the status of their children's hydration.


In addition, here are some other handling options for intestinal infections in children:


  • Anti -inflammatory drug.
  • Drugs to suppress the work of the immune system.
  • Antibiotics.
  • Anti -diarrhea and anti -pain medication.
  • Nutrition and supplement.
  • Operation.


Prevention of intestinal infections in children

Gastroenteritis can be easily transmitted from person to person. Therefore, mothers and children need to take action to reduce the transmission of the virus that causes infection. Rotavirus is the most common virus that causes intestinal infections. Therefore, mothers can provide vaccines to prevent rotavirus.


In addition, children must also be taught to wash their hands and avoid contaminated food. To prevent intestinal infections in infants, breastfeeding is a simple and effective way to help prevent gastroenteritis.


Babies who are breastfed have a much lower level of gastroenteritis compared to infants who are given formula milk. Parents can also help prevent dehydration by encouraging children to drink fluids even in small amounts but often.


Most children who have gastroenteritis have mild symptoms that will improve within a few days. The important thing is to make sure they have adequate fluid intake.


In many cases, you don't need to go to the doctor. However, the mother must take the child to the hospital immediately if the child experiences several situations such as:


  • Children under the age of 6 months.
  • Children have an underlying medical condition (for example, heart or kidney problems, diabetes, premature birth history).
  • The temperature is getting higher (fever).
  • Children begin to experience symptoms of dehydration.
  • The child looks sleepy or confused.
  • Frequent vomiting and unable to withstand fluids.
  • There is blood in diarrhea or vomiting them.
  • Experiencing severe stomach pain.
  • Exposed to an unknown viral infection.
  • Experiencing severe symptoms, or if the mother feels her condition is getting worse.
  • Symptoms of children do not subside (for example, vomiting for more than 1-2 days, or diarrhea that does not begin to subside after 3-4 days).

item.title: So as not to be confused, recognize the cause of the middle stomach pain
item.description:
So as not to be confused, recognize the cause of the middle stomach pain

by fastsong

Middle abdominal pain can be caused by various kinds of problems. Starting from gas or bloating, to more serious conditions such as inflammation of the intestine or Crohn disease. Abdominal pain can be in the form of cramps, blunt, intermittent, or sharp.


Limited local pain in one abdominal area often occurs due to problems with certain organs. Want to know what causes this condition? Check out more in the following discussion.


Causes of middle abdominal pain

Pain such as cramps can be associated with diarrhea, constipation, or flatulence. In women, this can be associated with menstruation, miscarriage, or reproductive complications.


This pain comes and goes, and can disappear by itself without treatment. Viral infections, bacteria, or parasites that affect the stomach and intestinal can also cause significant abdominal pain.


Here are some of the causes of middle stomach pain:


1. Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)

Abdominal pain related to IBS can be worse after eating or if you are stressed. If you have IBS, you will experience symptoms such as diarrhea or constipation and bloating, but do not cause bleeding or weight loss.


2. Constipation

You may experience sharp gas pain that occurs throughout the abdominal area if constipation is the cause of the middle stomach pain that you experience. People who experience constipation or constipation often feel bloated and stupid, and their stomachs even look distended.


3. Gastric ulcer

Gastric ulcer is a wound in the abdominal layer or the first part of the small intestine. This can cause a burning sensation that is similar to hunger. Other symptoms include nausea, vomiting or heartburn.


4. Pancreatitis

Another cause of middle stomach pain is pancreatitis, which is inflammation of the pancreas. This is a severe and sharp pain that occurs in the upper middle abdomen which can sometimes spread to the back or chest.


The sufferer may also experience other symptoms such as nausea, vomiting, and fever. Pancreatitis can occur as a sudden acute attack or chronic condition.


5. Crohn disease

Crohn disease is a type of chronic inflammatory intestinal disease (IBD). This inflammation can occur at the end of the small intestine or in the large intestine.


6. Inflammation of the appendix

Inflammation of the appendix can occur due to clogging the appendix, so that bacteria pile up in it. In the early stages, the symptoms of this condition can be in the form of middle stomach pain.


How to handle it?

Middle abdominal pain has a variety of causes and treatment choices. Some conditions may require surgery. However, if the cause is a stomach ulcer or infection, the doctor will overcome it with drugs.


If you do not know the cause of abdominal pain, it is important to find out, especially if it does not disappear by itself. Remember that even light cases can be serious.


  • However, if the middle stomach pain is related to digestion, you can start by treating yourself by:

  • Rest the intestine. Stop eating, or just eat foods that are easily digested like bananas.
  • Hydration. Drink lots of water.
  • Heat therapy. Try compressing using a bottle of warm water or soaking in a bathtub.
  • Home medicine. Like licorice to deal with bloating, ginger for indigestion, or peppermint to help relax the intestinal muscles.
